level.heading: District of Columbia public school funding.
level.text: The District of Columbia Public Schools should fully fund pre-kindergarten, full-day kindergarten, school counselors, and librarians.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary addition of subchapter see notes to ยง 38-2801.
For temporary (90-day) addition of Chapter 1B 1981 Ed., see notes following ยง 38-2801.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-175
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-175, see Historical and Statutory Notes following 38-2801.
